body:
Output, which is empty for the keyword/title part:

![ipad_pro_3rd_gen_home_page_framed](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53920743/76135538-a59fdb80-6062-11ea-97ec-6c076b2a1752.png)
![iPadPro12 9-inch2ndGeneration_home_page_framed](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53920743/76135540-a9cbf900-6062-11ea-9dd1-cc66f1aa4947.png)

This the warning during the generation. It cannot add the keyword/title text correctly. I have the font correctly installed, and it can generate iphone version. I really don't know what could be the problem

[‚†è] Framing screenshot './ja/ipad_pro_3rd_gen_home_page.png' identify: geometry does not contain image `/var/folders/n1/qp1sbb_j1f1_s7ds03wjxmrw0000gn/T/mini_magick20200307-68816-t1wxlr.png' @ warning/attribute.c/GetImageBoundingBox/507.
@david-young-fax can you try with Fastlane 2.142.0 (just to make sure #14628 is not the issue here)

I have the same issue with the languages ko, ja, hi, th, he, zh-Hant, zh-Hans using Fastlane 2.145.0. Did you found a solution in the meantime @david-young-fax ?

Same issue for me with : 
fastlane 2.145.0
With : chinese, japanese, russian and arabic (but mainly ... the rendering in arabic is very bad)

@lighthouse16  no I haven't found a solution yet. I tried to look into the code of fastlane, but I'm not familiar with Ruby and I have been quite busy on other things. 

Anyone could help debug this issue? I think likely it's a bug somewhere in fastlane. @bvirlet @janpio
